author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Astec Industries Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.47
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Astec Industries Inc:
* ASTEC INDUSTRIES REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 * Q4 SALES FELL 4.3 PERCENT TO $312.4 MILLION * ASTEC INDUSTRIES - ‍COMPANY‘S BACKLOG AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS $411.5 MILLION COMPARED TO $361.8 MILLION AT DECEMBER 31, 2016, AN INCREASE OF $49.6 MILLION OR 13.7%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
